author: Techlore
description:
I flew to Berlin for Nextcloud Hub 25 to see what's new! From powerful local AI features to digital sovereignty tools, Nextcloud 25 brings major performance upgrades, a cleaner interface, and game-changing capabilities that rival Big Tech—all while keeping your data under your control. Plus, behind-the-scenes from the conference, meeting the community, and why this matters for the future of open source. Techlore empowers individuals with practical digital privacy knowledge, security tools, and advocacy resources. Discover how to protect your online data and regain control of your digital identity.

📱 RESOURCES IN VIDEO:
• Nextcloud 25 Everything New: https://nextcloud.com/blog/nextcloud-hub25-autumn/
• Nextcloud Atomic: https://nextcloudatomic.com/
 • Gardiner Bryant's Coverage: https://youtu.be/NRmOsZ5Ef8I

title: Nextcloud 25: Everything New from the Berlin Conference (& Why It Matters)
